Latest Notifications

Project Robinhood (analyzing political hate speech on Twitter during the Indian Assembly Elections 2022) is live now!

CONSTRAINT: Second Workshop on Combating Online Hostile Posts (Collocated with ACL 2022)

LCS2 is inviting applications for RA, Lexicographer, and PhD Scholars. Click here to know details.

Tweets by lcs2iiitd
Follow @lcs2iiitd

Laboratory for Computational Social Systems (LCS2) is a research group led by Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty and Dr. Md. Shad Akhtar at Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi (IIIT-Delhi). Broad research interests of this group include Data Mining, Complex Networks, Social Computing, Natural Language Processing and Data-driven Cybersecurity.

News

  • August 09, 2022
    Dr Tanmoy Chakraborty has been appointed as the Associate Editor of ACM TALLIP.
  • August 07, 2022
    Paper accepted at TKDD 2022 Dhruv Sahnan, Vasu Goel, Sarah Masud, Chhavi Jain, Vikram Goyal, Tanmoy Chakraborty. DiVA: A Scalable, Interactive and Customizable Visual Analytics Platform for Information Diffusion on Large Networks.
  • July 22, 2022
    Aseem Srivastava has recieved the ACM-IARCS travel grant towards his KDD paper.

    Sarah Masud has recieved the ACM-W and Microsoft travel grant towards her KDD paper.

    Sarah Masud and Aseem Srivastava received the SIGKDD 2022 Student registration award.

    Shivam Sharma received IJCAI travel grant.
  • May 21, 2022
    Mohammad Aflah Khan got selected for Google Summer of Code under Tensorflow.

    Paper accepted at SIGKDD 2022 Sarah Masud, Manjot Bedi, Mohammad Aflah Khan, Md Shad Akhtar, Tanmoy Chakraborty. Proactively Reducing the Hate Intensity of Online Posts via Hate Speech Normalization.
